name: The Sims Medieval: Deluxe Pack
summary: Includes both The Sims Medieval and The Sims Medieval Pirates & Noble Adventure Pack. The Sims Medieval takes players back to the Middle Ages, where players can create a hero, go out on quests, and build a kingdom of their very own. Players' adventures decide the future of their realm, shaping it into a thriving utopia or a war-torn area of disaster. The Pirate Pack switches gears, tossing players into a feud between the Pirates of Aarbyville and the Nobles of Tredony.
